title: Holy shit, japanese Taric is even more fabulous than the english one
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGJYwWqnQfk
**Ezreal's knees are trembling. Lux stays jealous.**

replies.body: Lmao wtf at 0:20

O.o                      

I can't stop laughing... :18 - :24 seconds is just plain ridiculous.  Why is that even in the VO? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Death noises I think. The Japanese are just so goddamn good at making death sound like pleasure. Have you heard Ahri's?

[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYpqmJCJZTk)
Ahri's death sounds are nsfw
I just listened to Ahri's and wow...........{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

still, korean ahri remains unbeatable on that

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bRlvtPz3cg
Wow and we get such a bad rep for sexuality.  Do any of our champions make those noises when they die lol?
in english, I must admit i get aroused by elise's death sound...

After contemplating this, I realized that actually everyone's death sounds are also orgasmic grunts.

And the best one?

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/a4/Azir.death01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140827014438

8v)
90% of the female characters do actually. there are videos all over youtube of people making fun of them.
I here that am I'm just like bruh, just wow{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
nsfw?
Yeah those death sounds aren't meant to be played back to back, they pick one at random to play when a character dies. But when they ARE played back to back, hooo boy hope you brought clean trousers.

I was like O_O when i first heard these. 

thumbs up

good god he sounds like the male version of {{champion:103}}:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYpqmJCJZTk

Warning: put in headphones before :20 if you are in public... cause reasons O_o
MUST. NOT. FAP.
people like you are why i stopped playing for 3 months.
Seems like the video got removed yesterday, I guess people who stumbled upon this post saw it and reported it.
Oh Youtube, making trying to find evil hiding under every rock :L

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=p6cvkLU0,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-01-07T22:02:55.387+0000)
>

> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYpqmJCJZTk
> 
> Warning: put in headphones before :20 if you are in public... cause reasons O_o

To be fair, this is ahri...

10/10
Armor weak, shield heavy, hammer ready
Cooking up some magic
Dad's Recipe
That's it. I'm transferring to the Japanese server.
Why do that when you can just change the language voice pack. (There's a guide for getting the Korean voices; it'll update again when the JPN voices are up.)

You can do it early right now, tho some champs might be missing and the in game voices are actually slightly quieter then I think it should be 

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3zuj36/how_to_get_japanese_voiceover_in_your_game/

K.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuLT3THdliI
Hear 0:13 to 0:14, then tell me what you think.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G_rgzRrb8O0
Little satan ~~sounds like~~ has the voice actress of Pikachu.

Fuck EUW, I'm moving to Japan.

Teemo Teemo Chopper?????
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I actually think Teemo and Pikachu share the same voice actor. You know for the Japanese Anime, not the English one.

http://www.gamespot.com/articles/league-of-legends-cast-of-japanese-voice-actors-is/1100-6431541/

Edit: Yea wtf.

japanese teemo seems to be the voice for the japanese tony tony chopper from one piece. very fun to listen to and always a pleasure to see sort of voice.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I want to play on the Japanese server just to hear seiyuus from animes I like. ;(

I have mixed feelings about this.

He has emotion in this voice, but perhaps it's _too_ much emotion.

His voice is like a gem. Outrageous.
Truly, truly outrageous.
Yet a cigar isn't allowed?

Translation of the quote right after orgasm:

"Th-These diamond necklaces at this price....?! and I can't believe that they come with these matching ear pierces too~ <3"

Like, srslywtfh?
Can we all agree that they need to keep Taric fabulous going into his rework.

Got to 18 seconds and that's as far as I'm going.

http://37.media.tumblr.com/a9bbaace835672193704cefd40b672b1/tumblr_n78sqzslX41qau6svo1_500.gif
They need to make a way to replace the english voices with the japanese ones on the english client

I heard in a League of legends spanish speaking facebook that it sounded awful.

I think it sounds way more .... WAIT WTF 0:18
Fun fact: screenshots of the new client have shown a "change language" option, because as it turns out, not everyone who lives in North America speaks English. Weird, right?
Seriously?  That's awesome!
But if you just want the voices this wouldn't work since it changes all the text too
...are they keeping this voice for the VU later this year?
Probably. Would be a waste for them to hire two Japanese voice actors for a champion that's getting a new VO soon.
i know i had on pants before watching this
I'm not even into guys, but 0:20 gave me some really weird feels. >_>
I could have sworn it became a Yaoi at 0:20 XD
ouuhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh {{item:3070}}  HAHAHAHHAHAHHAHA

It's this kind of bullshit that makes me think the majority of the League community really are just a bunch of sheeple. He's supposed to be a Gem Knight for goodness' sake, not some flamboyant pansy in a suit of armor wielding a ridiculously shaped hammer. I really hope Riot changes his character into a more serious, respectable one with his rework but for some reason, I highly doubt they'll address it. I'm all for people having fun, but not at the price of essentially reducing a champion to a joke character. It was funny the first few times, but shit like this just breeds unfunny trolls and shitty memers who are toxic in their own ways.
One punch Taric please. That voice is too good.
bruh riot come one man

Those death sounds, truly truly truly fabulous <3

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
